channel.title: CC 410 - Advanced Programming :: CC 410 Textbook
channel.description: This is the textbook for CC 410 - Advanced Programming. Course Description: Advanced programming techniques and projects. Concepts from simulation and modeling, media applications, secure design, information management, parallelism, and networking. Software development methodologies, processes, and design patterns. Practical experience with professional communication and collaboration. Prerequisites: CC 315 Credits: 4

item.title: Example Projects
item.description: Examples to help build experience with code. These project use starter code and additional resources provided to current students only. Previous Semesters Are Here New Project Checklist Hello Real World Object-Oriented Programming Unit Testing Inheritance Debugging & Logging Design Patterns Parallel Programming Test Doubles Event-Driven Programming GUI Basics Combos & Libraries Releases Web Basics Forms REST Form Validation
